languages.text: "Значит, я тебе не нравлюсь, а этот металлический болван вызывает уважение? Воистину, вы — сумасшедшая раса".
"You dislike me, but this lump of metal commands your respect? You truly are a deranged breed."
languages.original_text: "Значит, я тебе не нравлюсь, а этот металлический болван вызывает уважение? Воистину, вы — сумасшедшая раса".

traits.locale_text: "So you don't like me but this dumb lump of metal commands your respect? You really are a crazy race."
"So you don't like me but this dumb lump of metal commands your respect? You really are a crazy race."
"So, you don't like me but this dumb lump of metal commands your respect? You really are a crazy race."
"So, you don't like me but this dumb lump of metal commands your respect? You really are a crazy race."
"You dislike me, but this lump of metal commands your respect? You truly are a deranged breed."
"You dislike me, but this lump of metal commands your respect? You truly are a deranged breed."

languages.text: «¿Yo te caigo mal pero este trozo de metal merece tu respeto? Sí, tu raza está loca».
languages.original_text: "You dislike me, but this lump of metal commands your respect? You truly are a deranged breed."

traits.locale_text: «O sea que ¿yo te caigo mal pero este trozo de metal merece tu respeto? Sí, tu raza está loca».

languages.text: « Alors comme ça, vous me détestez, mais ce tas de métal stupide mérite votre respect ? Vous et vos semblables, vous êtes vraiment cinglés. »
languages.original_text: "You dislike me, but this lump of metal commands your respect? You truly are a deranged breed."

traits.locale_text: « Alors comme ça, vous me détestez, mais ce tas de métal stupide mérite votre respect ? Vous et vos semblables, vous êtes vraiment cinglés. »

languages.text: 「お前自身は俺のことが気に食わないが、この馬鹿げた金属の塊から尊敬するよう命令されてるってのか？全くイカれた種族だぜ」
languages.original_text: "You dislike me, but this lump of metal commands your respect? You truly are a deranged breed."

traits.locale_text: 「お前自身は俺のことが気に食わないが、この馬鹿げた金属の塊から尊敬するよう命令されてるってのか？全くイカれた種族だぜ」

languages.text: “你们这些人不喜欢我，却对这块破铜烂铁肃然起敬？你们的种族真是没救了。”
languages.original_text: "You dislike me, but this lump of metal commands your respect? You truly are a deranged breed."

traits.locale_text: “你们这些人不喜欢我，却对这块破铜烂铁肃然起敬？你们的种族可够疯的。”

languages.text: "Mich mögt Ihr nicht, aber dieser Klumpen Metall gebietet Euren Respekt? Ihr seid wahrlich verrückt."
languages.original_text: "You dislike me, but this lump of metal commands your respect? You truly are a deranged breed."

traits.locale_text: "Mich mögt Ihr also nicht, aber dieser dumme Klumpen Metall gebietet Euren Respekt? Ihr seid wirklich ein verrücktes Volk."

languages.text: "Beni sevmiyorsun ama bu metal yığınına mı saygı duyuyorsun? Gerçekten de dengesizsin."
languages.original_text: "You dislike me, but this lump of metal commands your respect? You truly are a deranged breed."
